price: Isaan warra Firdawsiin dhaalanu. isaan ishee keessatti hafoodha.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَرِثُونَ ٱلۡفِرۡدَوۡسَ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yarithūna al-fir'dawsa hum fīhā khālidūna
